item.title: 美国监管机构称大型银行贷款信用风险仍处于温和水平
item.description: 美国银行监管机构周一表示，大型银团贷款相关的信用风险仍处于温和水平，并指出该趋势反映出利息支出增加及其他宏观经济因素的影响。【原文：Credit risk associated with large, syndicated bank loans remains moderate, US bank regulators said Monday, noting the trends reflect higher interest expenses and other macroeconomic factors.】

item.title: 美敦力与Neuralink竞争对手Precision合作开发脑机接口技术
item.description: 美敦力公司正与脑植入公司Precision Neuroscience Corp.达成合作协议，该医疗器械制造商将通过此协议获取神经数据，用于开发新产品。【原文：Medtronic Plc is partnering with brain implant company Precision Neuroscience Corp. in a deal that will give the medical device maker access to neural data it can use to develop new products.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织与世界银行理事会上周分别召开会议讨论委内瑞拉问题
item.description: 据知情人士透露，国际货币基金组织和世界银行的执行董事会上周分别召开会议讨论委内瑞拉问题。外界普遍预期，这个长期遭受孤立的国家需要重大援助才能重振其经济。【原文：The executive boards of the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank each met to discuss Venezuela last week, according to people familiar with the matter, amid expectations the nation will need major assistance to revive its long-isolated economy.】

item.title: 鲍威尔在司法调查中获得加拿大央行行长麦克勒姆的"全力支持"
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫·麦克勒姆在美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔表示央行已收到大陪审团传票后，对其表示了坚定支持。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem offered a staunch backing of Jerome Powell after the Federal Reserve chair said the central bank had been served with grand jury subpoenas.】

item.title: 彭博新能源财经称，元宇宙项目需新建价值140亿美元的反应堆
item.description: 据彭博新能源财经估算，新一代核能企业奥克洛公司和泰拉能源公司需投资逾140亿美元建造新型反应堆，以支持Meta Platforms Inc.的数据中心运营。【原文：Next-generation nuclear companies Oklo Inc. and TerraPower LLC will need to invest more than $14 billion in new reactors to support Meta Platforms Inc. data centers, according to estimates from BloombergNEF.】

item.title: 特朗普政府即将敲定与台湾的贸易协定
item.description: 据知情人士透露，特朗普政府正与台湾方面就关税协议进行最后磋商，此举旨在改善与这个关键亚洲伙伴的贸易条件。【原文：The Trump administration is closing in on a tariff agreement with Taiwan, according to a person familiar with the matter, a move toward improving trade terms with a key Asian partner.】

item.title: 太平洋投资管理公司、PGIM警告：特朗普与美联储的斗争将推高利率
item.description: 在太平洋投资管理公司、PGIM和德意志资产管理集团等大型债券公司，基金经理们警告称，特朗普总统对美联储独立性的攻击与其降低利率的目标背道而驰。【原文：At big bond firms like Pacific Investment Management Co., PGIM and DWS Group, money managers warn that President Donald Trump’s assault on the Federal Reserve’s independence is at odds with his goal of pulling down interest rates.】

item.title: 前司法部官员申请代理马杜罗案遭拒
item.description: 一名美国司法部前高官申请加入尼古拉斯·马杜罗的法律团队，但遭联邦法官驳回。此前，该法官与这位被罢免的委内瑞拉总统的现任律师发生争执。【原文：A request to join Nicolas Maduro’s legal team by a former top Justice Department official was rejected by a federal judge amid a fight with the ousted Venezuelan president’s current lawyer.】

item.title: Betterment客户数据遭网络加密货币诈骗攻击窃取
item.description: 个人理财平台Betterment周一发表声明称，该公司遭遇网络攻击，导致未经授权的个人向部分客户发送了"虚假的加密货币相关信息"。【原文：Personal finance platform Betterment fell victim to an online attack that allowed an unauthorized individual to send some customers a “fraudulent, crypto-related message,” the company said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州橙子产量将创近百年新低
item.description: 佛罗里达州的橙子收成预计将降至近一个世纪以来的最低水平，因为种植园面积的持续缩减抵消了单产的提升。【原文：Florida’s orange harvest is expected to fall to the lowest in nearly a century, as shrinking groves continue to offset improvements in yields.】

item.title: 2025年加拿大赴美旅行骤降28% 特朗普关税政策与"第51州"讽刺言论双重冲击
item.description: 去年加拿大赴美旅行人次减少28%，特朗普总统发起的贸易战以及其多次呼吁加拿大成为美国第51个州的言论激怒了许多北方国家民众。【原文：Canadians took 28% fewer trips to the US last year as President Donald Trump’s trade war and repeated calls for Canada to become the 51st state angered many in the northern nation.】

item.title: HF Sinclair公司向丹佛加油站销售受污染燃料
item.description: 科罗拉多州监管机构正处理数百起投诉，此前HF辛克莱公司向丹佛地区加油站销售了掺有柴油的汽油。【原文：Colorado regulators are fielding hundreds of complaints after HF Sinclair Corp. sold gasoline contaminated with diesel to Denver-area filling stations.】

item.title: 美联储独立之争的利害关系何在
item.description: 数十年来，经济发达国家始终将中央银行的独立性视为必要保障，使专业决策者能够根据经济需求制定利率政策。然而，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普对美联储施加的持续压力，对这一传统构成了显著挑战。【原文：For decades, economically advanced countries have recognized the independence of central banks as a necessary safeguard enabling expert policymakers to set interest rates based on the economy’s needs. In a striking challenge to that tradition, US President Donald Trump has exerted relentless pressure on the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: Discord的IPO将如何考验该应用的自由文化
item.description: 青少年最爱的聊天应用计划首次公开募股。【原文：Teens’ favorite chat app is planning an initial public offering.】

item.title: 土耳其财政部长称年底通胀率可能放缓至19%
item.description: 据知情人士透露，土耳其财政部长梅赫梅特·西姆塞克向投资者表示，年底通胀率可能放缓至约19%，其表态较市场预期更为乐观。【原文：Turkish Treasury and Finance Minister Mehmet Simsek told a group of investors that year-end inflation could slow to about 19%, according to people with knowledge of the matter, striking a more optimistic tone than markets.】

item.title: 玉米价格创2024年以来最大跌幅，因美国农业部意外上调美国单产预期
item.description: 玉米期货创下2024年7月以来最大跌幅，此前美国农业部上调了美国玉米供应预期，而分析师此前预期供应量将下降。【原文：Corn futures fell by the most since July 2024 after the US Department of Agriculture raised its outlook for American supplies when analysts were expecting a cut.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉债券涨势受挫，特朗普冻结石油资金
item.description: 委内瑞拉债券价格下跌，因美国总统特朗普采取行动阻止债权人获取石油收入，这引发了市场对债务重组最终偿付规模的质疑。【原文：Venezuela bonds slipped after President Donald Trump moved to block creditors from accessing oil revenue, raising doubts about the size of a payout in any eventual debt restructuring.】

item.title: 玻利维亚拟颁布新经济法令，不会恢复燃油补贴
item.description: 玻利维亚总统罗德里戈·帕斯周日晚间在网络直播记者会上表示，政府正准备颁布一项新的经济法令，以取代此前引发全国抗议和道路封锁的旧法令。不过，取消燃油补贴的政策仍将维持不变。【原文：Bolivia’s government is preparing a new economic decree to replace a previous one that had sparked nationwide protests and road blockades, though the elimination of fuel subsidies will remain in place, President Rodrigo Paz said in a webcast press conference Sunday evening.】

item.title: 阿克拉拉公司看好智利下任总统将加速推进稀土项目
item.description: 阿克拉拉资源公司认为有空间加快智利稀土项目的开发进度，该项目有望与巴西一个更先进的项目同期投产。【原文：Aclara Resources Inc. sees room to speed the development of a Chilean rare-earth project, potentially bringing it online around the same time as a more advanced operation in Brazil.】

item.title: 谷歌确认与苹果达成多年期人工智能合作协议，为苹果设备和Siri提供技术支持
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet确认已与苹果公司达成多年期协议，为这家iPhone制造商的人工智能技术提供支持，包括Siri语音助手。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google confirmed that it has entered a multiyear deal with Apple Inc. to power the iPhone maker’s artificial intelligence technology, including the Siri voice assistant.】

item.title: SQM将发行混合债券加入新兴市场债务销售浪潮
item.description: 全球最大锂生产商之一SQM计划自2024年以来首次进军国际债券市场，发行至少5亿美元的美元计价债券。【原文：SQM, one of the world’s biggest lithium producers, plans to tap the international bond market for the first time since 2024 with the sale of at least $500 million in dollar-denominated notes.】

item.title: 前美联储主席、财政部长谴责对鲍威尔的调查
item.description: 三名前美联储主席和四名前财政部长——他们曾效力于民主党和共和党政府——谴责司法部对现任美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的调查，称此举将损害美国中央银行的独立性。【原文：Three former heads of the Federal Reserve and four former Treasury secretaries in Democratic and Republican administrations decried a Department of Justice investigation into current Fed Chair Jerome Powell, saying it would undermine the US central bank’s independence.】

item.title: 巴西化工巨头在债务负担持续审查期间支付债券利息
item.description: 知情人士称，全球最大石化企业之一巴西布拉斯科公司周一支付了部分美元债券到期利息，此举缓解了投资者担忧。该公司正持续评估其债务状况，而行业低迷态势仍在持续。【原文：Braskem SA, one of the world’s largest petrochemical makers, paid interest due Monday on some of its dollar bonds, people familiar with the matter said, easing investor concerns while it continues to review its debt amid a prolonged industry downturn.】

item.title: 若化肥被排除在欧盟碳税之外，雅苒可能放弃美国项目
item.description: 雅苒国际公司警告称，如果欧盟将其旗舰碳边境税排除化肥产品，该公司可能放弃在美国计划实施的低排放氨项目。【原文：Yara International ASA warned that it could abandon a planned low-emission ammonia project in the US if the European Union was to exclude fertilizers from its flagship carbon border levy.】

item.title: 德国克林贝尔称欧洲在与美国分歧中不能天真
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯·克林贝尔表示，欧美之间的裂痕正在扩大，并警告称欧洲不应对这种关系变化视而不见。【原文：German Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil said rifts between the US and Europe are widening, warning that the region mustn’t close its eyes to the shift in relations.】

item.title: 字母表公司市值突破4万亿美元，巩固其人工智能领域赢家地位
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet Inc.周一市值突破4万亿美元大关，成为少数几家跨过这一门槛的企业之一。随着投资者日益将该公司视为人工智能浪潮中的最大赢家之一，其市值持续攀升。【原文：Alphabet Inc. broke above a $4 trillion market capitalization on Monday, becoming one of the few companies to ever cross the threshold as investors increasingly see the Google parent as one of the biggest winners of the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 维托尔、托克公司拟将委内瑞拉原油运往加勒比海储存设施
item.description: 全球两大商品贸易商计划将委内瑞拉石油运往加勒比地区的储存设施，这些设施很可能成为出口的中转站——此前美国要求他们负责销售该国石油。【原文：Two of the world’s largest commodities traders plan to move Venezuelan oil to storage facilities in the Caribbean, which would likely serve as a staging point for exports after the US asked them to market the oil.】

item.title: 凯罗斯称伊朗石油库存因抗议浪潮骤降
item.description: 据一家通过卫星监测库存的公司创始人透露，伊朗关键出口终端的石油储备量较年初下降了约五分之一，这可能表明该国正趁着过去两周的动荡浪潮，将原油转移至安全地带。【原文：Iranian oil stockpiles at a key export terminal are about a fifth lower than where they started the year, a possible sign the country is moving crude out of harm’s way amid a wave of unrest over the past two weeks, according to the founder of a company that tracks inventories with satellites.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦石油运输量再度大幅减少，因关键港口CPC管道中断
item.description: 由于恶劣天气、设备维护和无人机袭击导致装运量下降，哈萨克斯坦经黑海重要港口出口的原油再次大幅减少，推高了该国原油价格。【原文：Kazakh crude exports from a key port in the Black Sea have been slashed again as bad weather, maintenance and drone damage cut the nation’s loadings, driving up the price of those barrels.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行放弃自主研发的人工智能工具，转而采用微软的Copilot
item.description: 法国兴业银行正放弃其自主研发的人工智能工具，转而采用微软公司的Copilot解决方案，这凸显出即便大型金融机构在开发成本高昂的技术产品时也面临挑战。【原文：Societe Generale SA is scrapping a self-developed artificial intelligence tool in favor of Microsoft Corp.’s Copilot solution, highlighting the challenges even large lenders face in building out their own offering in the cost-intensive technology.】
